com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap

Class AestheticTransformFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap.TransformFilters
      • com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap.AestheticTransformFilters

  • public class AestheticTransformFilters
extends TransformFilters
    Bitmap shapes/perception transforming filters.

    Water Ripple
    Ripple effect with wavelength of 16, amplitude 10 and radius of 150.

    Lens
    Lens with refractionIndex of 1.5 and radius of 150.

    Reflection

    Flush 3D

    Sketch

    Stipple

    Fade
    Fade using the fadeWidth of 100

    Dissolve
    Dissolve using the density of 0.65 and softness 0.50. This bitmap has a black background

    Diffuse
    Diffuse using the scale of 30 and edgeAction ZERO. This bitmap has a black background

    Twirl
    Twirl using the angle of -2.5, radius 100 and TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_CLAMP.

    Author:
    elton.stephen.kent

    • Constructor Detail

      • AestheticTransformFilters

    • Method Detail

      • waterRipple

        public static Bitmap waterRipple(Bitmap src,
                 float wavelength,
                 float amplitude,
                 float phase,
                 float centreX,
                 float centreY,
                 float radius,
                 int edgeAction,
                 Bitmap.Config outputConfig)
        Creates a water ripple effect on a bitmap
        Parameters:
        src -
        wavelength - of the ripple waves. recommended: 16
        amplitude - of the ripple waves. recommended: 10
        phase - of the ripple waves. recommended:0
        centreX - x coordinate for the origin of the ripple. the value 0.5 represents the centre of the bitmap
        centreY - Y coordinate for the origin of the ripple. the value 0.5 represents the centre of the bitmap
        radius - radius of the ripple. could be any value that falls within the bounds of the image
        edgeAction - for the effect. TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_CLAMP, TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_RGB_CLAMP, TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_WRAP and TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_ZERO. recommended: TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_CLAMP
        outputConfig -
        Returns:

      • lens

        public static Bitmap lens(Bitmap src,
          float centreX,
          float centreY,
          float radius,
          float refractionIndex,
          int edgeAction,
          Bitmap.Config outputConfig)
        Simulates a magnifying lens placed over the given coordinate of an image
        Parameters:
        src -
        centreX - the X coordinate of the center of the lens. The value 0.5 represents the centre of the bitmap
        centreY - the Y coordinate of the center of the lens. The value 0.5 represents the centre of the bitmap
        radius - Radius of the lens
        refractionIndex - lens refraction index. recommended:1.5
        edgeAction - recommended: TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_CLAMP
        outputConfig -
        Returns:

      • createReflection

        public static final Bitmap createReflection(Bitmap image,
                      int reflectionHeight,
                      Bitmap.Config outputConfig)
        Create a reflection of an image
        Parameters:
        image - source image
        reflectionHeight - height of the reflection
        outputConfig - Bitmap configuration of the output bitmap
        Returns:
        Image the height of the image is increased to accommodate the reflection height.

      • sparkle

        public static Bitmap sparkle(Bitmap src,
             int rayColor,
             int shineAmount,
             int noOfRays,
             int sparkleRadius,
             int randomness,
             OutputConfiguration outputConfig)
        Creates a sparkle effect from the middle of the bitmap
        Parameters:
        src -
        rayColor - of the light rays.
        shineAmount - shine amount.
        noOfRays - number of light rays in the sparkle. min:0 max:300.
        sparkleRadius - of the sparkle. min:0 max:300.
        randomness - sparkle randomness. min:0 max:50.
        outputConfig -
        Returns:

        Performs fading effect on the width specified
        Parameters:
        src -
        angle -
        fadeStart -
        fadeWidth - width of the image that should be faded
        invert - the specified bitmap width is inverted in the fade
        sides - number of sides. recommended:0
        outputConfig -
        Returns:

      • dissolve

        public static Bitmap dissolve(Bitmap src,
              float density,
              float softness,
              OutputConfiguration outputConfig)
        A filter which "dissolves" an image by thresholding the alpha channel with random numbers.
        Parameters:
        src -
        density - the density of the image in the range 0..1.
        softness - the softness of the dissolve in the range 0..1.
        outputConfig -
        Returns:
